title: Build error in Sparc64
body:
I found this error when I play around with sparc64(gcc102.fsffrance.org) in GCC compile farm. 
It seems like we forgot to include "memmodel.h" before "tm_p.h". 

``` bash
In file included from ./tm_p.h:4,
                 from ../../gcc/config/sparc/sparc-rust.c:22:
../../gcc/config/sparc/sparc-protos.h:45:47: error: use of enum 'memmodel' without previous declaration
   45 | extern void sparc_emit_membar_for_model (enum memmodel, int, int);
      |                                               ^~~~~~~~
make[2]: *** [../../gcc/config/sparc/t-sparc:33: sparc-rust.o] Error 1
make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-token.cc: In member function 'const string& Rust::Token::get_str() const':
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-token.cc:126:40: warning: unquoted sequence of 2 consecutive punctuation characters '',' in format [-Wformat-diag]
  126 |        "attempted to get string for '%s', which has no string. "
      |                                        ^~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-token.cc:127:39: warning: spurious trailing punctuation sequence '.' in format [-Wformat-diag]
  127 |        "returning empty string instead.",
      |                                       ^
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-token.cc:126:37: warning: unterminated quote character ''' in format [-Wformat-diag]
  126 |        "attempted to get string for '%s', which has no string. "
      |                                     ^
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc: In member function 'Rust::TokenPtr Rust::Lexer::parse_byte_char(Location)':
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1321:21: warning: comparison is always false due to limited range of data type [-Wtype-limits]
 1321 |       if (byte_char > 127)
      |           ~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1324:11: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1324 |     "byte char %<%c%> out of range", byte_char);
      |           ^~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1332:59: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1332 |    rust_error_at (get_current_location (), "unclosed byte char");
      |                                                           ^~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1350:59: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1350 |    rust_error_at (get_current_location (), "unclosed byte char");
      |                                                           ^~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1360:43: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1360 |        "no character inside %<%> for byte char");
      |                                           ^~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc: In member function 'Rust::TokenPtr Rust::Lexer::parse_byte_string(Location)':
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1396:20: warning: comparison is always false due to limited range of data type [-Wtype-limits]
 1396 |    if (output_char > 127)
      |        ~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1399:10: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1399 |         "char %<%c%> in byte string out of range",
      |          ^~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc: In member function 'Rust::TokenPtr Rust::Lexer::parse_decimal_int_or_float(Location)':
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1883:34: warning: unquoted keyword 'float' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1883 |     "invalid type suffix %qs for float literal",
      |                                  ^~~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1932:34: warning: unquoted keyword 'float' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1932 |     "invalid type suffix %qs for float literal",
      |                                  ^~~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc: In member function 'Rust::TokenPtr Rust::Lexer::parse_char_or_lifetime(Location)':
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:1978:53: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 1978 |    rust_error_at (get_current_location (), "unended char literal");
      |                                                     ^~~~
../../gcc/rust/lex/rust-lex.cc:2035:47: warning: unquoted keyword 'char' in format [-Wformat-diag]
 2035 |      "expected %' after character constant in char literal");
      |                                               ^~~~
In file included from ./tm_p.h:4,
                 from ../../gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:29:
../../gcc/config/sparc/sparc-protos.h:45:47: error: use of enum 'memmodel' without previous declaration
   45 | extern void sparc_emit_membar_for_model (enum memmodel, int, int);
      |                                               ^~~~~~~~

```
